charges.charge_disposition: Deft placed in custody of BOP for a total of 177 months: 57 months as to each of Ct. 1 &; 2, to run concurrently, and a term of 120 months as to Ct 4 to be served consecutively to the term imposed to Ct 1 &; 2. This term to run consecutively with deft's term imposed in case 95-05007 in the ND of FL &; 91-545JC-01 in the Dist. of New Mexico. Deft. remanded to the USM. Supervised release-3 yrs total. SMA-total of $150.00. CrBK #8, pages 265-272. (1)

Deft placed in custody of BOP for a total of 144 months: 24 mos. as to Ct. 1; 24 mos. as to Ct. 3 to run concurrent with term in Ct. 1; 120 mons. as to Ct. 5 consecutive to terms of Ct. 1 &; Ct. 3. The term imposed is to run consecutively with the term imposed in 95-05007, ND of FL. Deft. remanded to USM. Total of 3 yrs supervised release. Total SMA-$150.00. CrBk #8, pages 273-279. (1)
